EmailTemplate.subject: Fighting Fit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer, Honeywell offers a range of upgrade solutions for your F16 that deliver operational efficiencies, enhance critical capabilities and extend the life of your fleet. Regardless of your mission, our reliable and capable innovations provide the power to protect and the technology to perform, so you can increase asset availability while reducing operating cost. Join our upgrade program to keep your fleet flying longer, safer and more efficiently.
